title: Commission Decision of 15 July 1992 amending the lists of standards institutions annexed to Council Directive 89/189/EEC
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 15 July 1992  amending the lists of standards institutions annexed to Council Directive 89/189/EEC  (92/400/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The lists annexed to Directive 83/189/EEC are hereby replaced by the lists annexed to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 July 1992. For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 109, 26. 4. 1983, p. 8. (2) OJ No L 128, 18. 5. 1990, p. 15. (3) OJ No C 117, 11. 5. 1989, p. 1.
